chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert x T1 E) t2 T2 -> forall t1 : term, j E t1 T1 -> j E (subst t1 x t2) T2

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive j : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop := JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T | JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2) | JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2 | JTyAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j (map (shift 0)
Inductive term : Set := TVar : nat -> term | TAbs : term -> term | TApp : term -> term -> term | TTyAbs : term -> term | TTyApp : term -> term Arguments TVar _%nat_scope
Notation insert x a e := (raw_insert x (Some a) e)
Inductive ty : Set := TyVar : nat -> ty | TyArrow : ty -> ty -> ty | TyForall : ty -> ty Arguments TyVar _%nat_scope
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
j_ind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) ->...-> P e t t0
j_sind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> SProp, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) ->...-> P e t t0
JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2
JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)
term_weakening : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall (x : nat) (U : ty) (E' : env ty), insert x U E = E' -> j E' (shift x t) T
type_weakening : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall (x : nat) (E' : list (option ty)) (T' : ty), map (shift x) E = E' -> shift x T = T' -> j E' t T'
JTyAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j (map (shift 0) E) t T -> j E (TTyAbs t) (TyForall T)
JTyApp : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T U U' : ty), j E t (TyForall T) -> subst U 0 T = U' -> j E (TTyApp t) U'
JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T
Inductive red : term -> term -> Prop := RedBeta : forall t1 t2 : term, red (TApp (TAbs t1) t2) (subst t2 0 t1) | RedTyBeta : forall t : term, red (TTyApp (TTyAbs t)) t | RedContextTAbs : forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TAbs t1) (TAbs t2) | RedContextTAppLeft : forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 ->...-> red (TTyApp t1) (TTyApp t2) Arguments RedContextTAbs [t1 t2] Arguments RedContextTAppLeft [t1 t2] Arguments RedContextTAppRight [t1 t2] Arguments RedContextTTyAbs [t1 t2] Arguments RedContextTTyApp [t1 t2]
red_sind : forall P : term -> term -> SProp, (forall t1 t2 : term, P (TApp (TAbs t1) t2) (subst t2 0 t1)) -> (forall t : term, P (TTyApp (TTyAbs t)) t) -> (forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TAbs t1) (TAbs t2)) -> (forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TApp t1 t) (TApp t2 t)) -> (forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TApp t t1) (TApp t t2)) ->...-> P t t0
red_ind : forall P : term -> term -> Prop, (forall t1 t2 : term, P (TApp (TAbs t1) t2) (subst t2 0 t1)) -> (forall t : term, P (TTyApp (TTyAbs t)) t) -> (forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TAbs t1) (TAbs t2)) -> (forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TApp t1 t) (TApp t2 t)) -> (forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TApp t t1) (TApp t t2)) -> (forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TTyAbs t1) (TTyAbs t2)) ->...-> P t t0
TraverseVarIsIdentity_term = {| traverse_var_is_identity := fun (f : nat -> nat -> term) (H : forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall l : nat, traverse f l t0 = t0) (fun n l : nat => H l n) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall l : nat, traverse f l t0 = t0) (l : nat) => let H0 : traverse_term f (S l) t0 = t0 := IHt (S l) in (fun H1 : traverse_term f (S l) t0 = t0 => eq_trans (f_equal (fun f0 : term -> term => f0 (traverse_term f (S l) t0)) eq_refl) (f_equal TAbs H1)) H0) (fun (t1 : term) (IHt1 : forall l : nat, traverse...
TraverseRelative_ty = {| traverse_relative := fun (f g : nat -> nat -> ty) (p : nat) (t : ty) => ty_ind (fun t0 : ty => forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse g l t0) (fun (n m l : nat) (H : forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) (H0 : m = l + p) => eq_ind_r (fun m0 : nat => traverse f m0 (TyVar n) = traverse g l (TyVar n)) (H l n) H0) (fun (t1 : ty) (IHt1 : forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p...
TraverseRelative_term = {| traverse_relative := fun (f g : nat -> nat -> term) (p : nat) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse g l t0) (fun (n m l : nat) (H : forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) (H0 : m = l + p) => eq_ind_r (fun m0 : nat => traverse f m0 (TVar n) = traverse g l (TVar n)) (H l n) H0) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p ->...
traverse_ty = fix traverse_ty (f : nat -> nat -> ty) (l : nat) (T : ty) {struct T} : ty := match T with | TyVar x => f l x | TyArrow T1 T2 => TyArrow (traverse_ty f l T1) (traverse_ty f l T2) | TyForall T0 => TyForall (traverse_ty f (1 + l) T0) end : (nat -> nat -> ty) -> nat -> ty -> ty Arguments traverse_ty _%function_scope _%nat_scope

RedBeta : forall t1 t2 : term, red (TApp (TAbs t1) t2) (subst t2 0 t1)
TraverseFunctorial_term = {| traverse_functorial := fun (f g : nat -> nat -> term) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall l : nat, traverse g l (traverse f l t0) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t0) (fun n l : nat => let H : f l n = f l n := eq_refl in (let H0 : l = l := eq_refl in (let H1 : g = g := eq_refl in (fun (_ : g = g) (_ : l = l) (_ : f l n = f l n) => eq_refl) H1) H0) H) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall l : nat, traverse g l (traverse f l t0) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t0) (l...
Build_TraverseVarInjective : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T), (forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (t1 t2 : T) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t1 = traverse_var f l t2 -> t1 = t2) -> TraverseVarInjective
traverse_term = fix traverse_term (f : nat -> nat -> term) (l : nat) (t : term) {struct t} : term := match t with | TVar x => f l x | TAbs t0 => TAbs (traverse_term f (1 + l) t0) | TApp t1 t2 => TApp (traverse_term f l t1) (traverse_term f l t2) | TTyAbs t0 => TTyAbs (traverse_term f l t0) | TTyApp t0 => TTyApp (traverse_term f l t0) end : (nat -> nat -> term) -> nat -> term -> term Arguments traverse_term _%function_scope _%nat_scope
closed_subst_invariant : forall (k : nat) (t : ty), closed k t -> forall j : nat, j >= k -> forall v : ty, subst v j t = t
TraverseVarInjective_term = {| traverse_var_injective := fun (f : nat -> nat -> nat) (H : forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) (t1 : term) => term_ind (fun t2 : term => forall (t3 : term) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t2 = traverse_var f l t3 -> t2 = t3) (fun (n : nat) (t2 : term) => match t2 as t return (forall l : nat, traverse_var f l (TVar n) = traverse_var f l t -> TVar n = t) with | TVar n0 => fun (l : nat) (h : TVar (f l n) = TVar (f l n0)) => let H0 : TVar (f l n0) = TVar (f l n0) -> TVar n = TVar n0 := match h in...
Record TraverseVarInjective (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseVarInjective { traverse_var_injective : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (t1 t2 : T) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t1 = traverse_var f l t2 -> t1 = t2 } Arguments TraverseVarInjective {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_TraverseVarInjective [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
closed_monotonic : LiftLift -> forall k t : nat, closed k t -> forall j : nat, j >= k -> closed j t
subst_subst : forall (t : ty) (k : nat) (v : ty) (s : nat) (w : ty), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)
subsume_insert_inversion : forall (A : Type) (sub : A -> A -> Prop) (e1 : env A) (x : nat) (a2 : A) (e2 : env A), subsume sub e1 (insert x a2 e2) -> exists (f1 : env A) (a1 : A), e1 = insert x a1 f1 /\ subsume sub f1 e2 /\ sub a1 a2
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
map_insert_map : forall (A : Type) (f g h : A -> A) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), (forall a0 : A, f (g a0) = g (h a0)) -> map f (insert x a (map g e)) = insert x (f a) (map g (map h e))
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
